section.name: WOUnit Task Manual
section.p: WOUnit is an Ant task to run WebObjects tests from the JUnit testing framework. It is a WO-friendly extension of JUnit Ant task.
There are no special parameters. The documentation for JUnit applies.

The nested frameworks is a FrameworkSet structure that specifies the names of the WebObjects Frameworks needed to run the unit tests. The jar files from these frameworks will be added to the WOUnit CLASSPATH.
